inn1.comm: full swinging ball, lands on middle and straightens down the line. Warner defends off the front foot.
125.5 kph, but the ball again straightens nicely from a full length outside off. Warner defends to point with an opened face.
Warner gets a little too far across as he defends another ball that straightens from middle and off.
back of a length, PK is getting the ball to angle in and go straight. Warner defends.
goes further short, but no width - generally good lines. Warner defends to cover.
top start from PK. After getting five of them to go away, he bends one in drastically and catches Warner unawares. The ball bursts through to hit his pad as he looks to work to leg from the crease.
swing for Irfan now. The ball yo-yos back into Watson from outside off, and he defends cautiously with bat and pad thrust forward.
133 kph, fuller and swinging down the line. Watson gets the front pad across and plays a tad around it, to the leg side.
Watson defends with very soft hands as Irfan swings it in again. Played so softly that it spun back, but didn't go near the stumps.
this is a good start from India. Ten balls on the money. Irfan again looks for the lbw with a pleasing shape into the right hander. Watson inside-edges the front-foot defensive onto his pad.
Australia are away. Watson is away. Short of a length outside off, he stays back and chops it to Umesh at third man.

too short, but gets it to swing again. Warner stays back and gets a thick edge as the ball deviates away from his clam-fisted steer. The edge flies over the heads of the slip fielders down to the third man boundary.
back of a length to Watson, he defends after getting half forward. Soft hands again, very typical of Watson.

If you remember the CB Series final from 2008, this is almost exactly how PK got rid of Ricky Ponting. Back of a length, a hint of wobble away from the batsman. Watson goes back and looks to bang it over the leg side, but miscues it, perhaps because of the deviation away from the bat, and the pull loops gingerly to mid-on. India have struck early, Watson goes back after a short-lived comeback.
PK continues to swerve it away from the right hander, but this is too wide of off stump to trouble Forrest.
makes him play with a fuller length ball. Forrest plays the line cautiously. Defended to the off side.
back of a length, Forrest pokes it to the off side from the crease.
Forrest is away, as PK bowls his first ball that's not on target. On the pads, nudged cautiously in front of square leg for one.
PK curls one in from outside off and Forrest is caught pushing tentatively inside the line... India are abuzz here.
straighter, swinging in towards middle and off, and it is defended to the on side.
stays crease-bound and blocks a length ball to cover.
Forrest stays in the crease and defends to the off side again. He does play a generous number of dot-balls this man. Though, this is still early days in his innings.
the sucker ball, Irfan gets it to hold its line as it angles across. Forrest wisely lets it go.
pins him in the crease yet again with a length ball that straightens. Forrest blocks to mid-on. Maiden for Irfan now.
Warner pushes a single into the wide mid-off region as PK keeps it on a length outside off.
PK gets so close to the stumps from over the wicket that he knocks the bails off. (No, he wasn't attempting the Mankad.) Forrest defends from the crease to point.
PK slants one too far down the leg side and it is called a wide. First really poor ball of the day.
short of a length outside off. Forrest opens the face and dabs to point for a single.

the big curve-ball from PK that bends in drastically from wide of the crease, round the stumps, and restricts Warner's scoring ideas through the off side. This came in too far, and Warner tucked it to the leg side for one.
and this one comes in sharply the other way. Can you believe India have been benching this man through the series? Forrest manages to keep this one out.
straighter this time, Forrest can't work the ball away cleanly off the pads.
top timing from Warner. He sets up a solid base as he shuffles across and punches hard wide of mid-on. Gambhir's the man there, and he chases it down and slides to pull it in.
finally some release for Australia. Irfan drifts the indipper onto the pads, and Forrest smartly gets inside the line and helps it along to fine leg. Easy runs.
over-pitched outside off stump, Forrest makes a proud front-foot press and drives to mid-off.
edgy, but safe. Stays back and goes at a short ball angling across with hard hands. There's no one at gully to catch it.
Irfan's fluffed his lines in this over. This one goes too far down the leg side as he attempts a yorker, and it goes off Warner's boot to fine leg as he attempts the flick.
hard hands again. 132 kph, Irfan swings it away from Warner, who edges it through gully which is vacant once more. 13 off the over.

jabbed away. PK drops marginally short, Warner falls back in the crease and whips efficiently through wide mid-on. Gambhir is again the man chasing, and the fielding wasn't too shabby. Three runs taken though.

PK does it again. Slower ball from PK, he rolled the fingers over and got it to stop on Forrest and go away. Forrest tries to push to the off side, but gets a thin inside edge that drops onto the stumps.
angled across Huss from over the stumps. He stays in the crease and shoulders arms.
back of a length this time, Hussey stays in the crease and defends compactly.
pitched up wide of off stump and it straightens down the line. Hussey doesn't try to play it.
sharp slant away from the left hander. PK has made a strong comeback to the India side. Hussey lets this one go.
Warner seems to have got the measure of Irfan at the moment. Back of a length again, the ball straightens into the middle of Warner's bat as he punches between point and cover.
fuller length, draws Warner forward and gets him to block to mid-on.

rubbish ball, carved away with intent. 134 kph, pitched well up and swinging, but it was about two feet wide of off stump. Warner did well to reach it despite not moving the feet and just slashed it over the covers.
Warner's toying with Irfan now. Over-compensates with a short of length offering, Warner jumps back - he seemed to expect that - and whips gloriously through midwicket for four more.
another poor ball, this time he escapes. Warner hacks a short and wide ball without timing to short cover.
and again. Over-pitched on the pads, that was asking to be swiped through midwicket, but Warner finds the fielder. 23 from 2 very average overs from Irfan, after a strong start.
PK continues to drop on a good length and angle it across the left hander. Hussey leaves.
shapes away after angling across towards off stump. Another leave from Hussey.
full length ball on off stump, Hussey reaches out to cover the line and blocks to cover.
pitched up wide of off stump, Hussey lets another one go.

edged, but safe. Hussey was looking to swing what seemed to be a short ball angling across him to the leg side, but the ball swing away devilishly to take a top edge. It flew high but didn't have the legs to carry to third man. And third man (Ashwin) surely didn't have the legs to get anywhere near it. Landed at least 10 yards away.
short of a length to Warner, he stays in the crease and defends to the off side.
full length from over the stumps, and Hussey defends.
Irfan surely prefers having Warner at his end. Hussey leans out and defends to point again.
Hussey drives a full swinging ball to mid-off and sets off for a quick single. Gambhir fields, the ball is following Senior No. 3 today.
angled into Warner's pads and he whips behind square for a single.
another single for Hussey, who presses forward and pushes into the covers.
Warner's turn now to push a length ball past short cover for another single.
that swung in from wide of the crease. PK must love this two new-balls rule. Warner stays back and defends to the off side.
shorter and straighter. Warner goes back in the crease and forces through wide mid-on for a single.
PK is hit for a four at long last. Hussey gets a fractionally shorter ball outside off and guides it expertly through cover point for four. Timing at its best.
back of a length again, but no width. Hussey defends to the off side.
back of a length outside off from round the stumps. Hussey stays in the crease and chops to point.
angled in from wide of the crease. Hussey defends towards mid-on.
tossed up outside off, Warner lunges out confidently and drives to mid-off.
straighter, that drifted in towards the pad and Warner defends.
tossed up on middle and leg, and straightening. Warner plays it back to the bowler.
on the pad, Warner works it behind square for a single.
tossed up on Hussey's pads, he turns it straight to midwicket.
good start from Ashwin. Flighted outside off and Hussey leans out to defend to the covers.
inside edged, but past the stumps. Short of a length ball outside off, Warner tries to cut despite having no room and chops it past the stumps. He hustles back for the second. Top running this.
on the pads this time, and Warner plays that punchy whip for the nth time today. Two more through midwicket, and the 50 is up. Most of them, courtesy Irfan Pathan.
pushes Warner back with a 125 kph ball. Warner stays back and defends to the leg side.
angled into the pads once more. Warner tucks it straight to midwicket.
slow bumper at 124 kph. The leg umpire calls it a wide as Warner lets it go.
onto the pads again. PK is not swinging it much any more. Warner tucks it square for a single.

what delightful running from Hussey and Warner! Back of a length and on the pads, Hussey turns it to square leg dexterously and sets off. Jadeja had acres to cover before he could get ti it, and that allowed a couple more to be added.
slow, high and loopy on the stumps. Warner presses forward and drives through mid-off for a single

a youngster misfields, and it results in a run-out. Maybe, MS Dhoni has a point. Tossed up on off stump, Hussey leans out and drives it straight through Raina at short cover. The single is taken, as Irfan runs around from wide long-off to field it. They decide to go for the second even as Irfan lines up his throw. And then Warner sends Hussey back. No chance. Good throw, straight to Ashwin, who whips the bails out as Hussey dives in. Replays are in, the problem was that Warner started the first run late. He didn't have enough time for the second really ...
slips this one down the leg side.
flighted outside off, Warner drives to Irfan again, and this time Irfan fumbles a couple of times. No harm done.
spin and bounce, and an appeal for a bat-pad chance. DJ was looking to flick and missed. It went off pad to the leg side and Dhoni ran across to pouch it.
DJ is away, the ball spins in towards the pads and is tucked towards the leg side for one.
too short. Warner hacks it square for a single ... PK misfields now and they come back for the second. Whoa, PK nearly throws the stumps down from 50 yards away, but DJ seemed safely in anyway.
Praveen misfields again. Short of a length outside off, punched into the covers and his misfield allows the second.
over-pitched to DJ, who drives superbly through mid-off. The dive is in vain, and Tiwary runs back towards the boundary to pull it in.
short ball from Yadav, shoddy start from him, and Warner's looking increasingly comfortable. He skips back and heaves easily off the hips through backward square leg for four more.,
goes very full now, he isn't trying the in-between lengths at all. Warner drills it straight to mid-off.
146 kph, but Warner is still early on the push-drive. He nearly scoops it straight to mid-off, but it drops short ...
angled into the pads now, Warner slaps it from the crease through backward square leg for a single.
drifts in from back of a length, and Warner defends to the leg side.
short of a length, but no width for Warner as he tries to cut. Can't time it and it is fielded at cover.
three dots to start the PP. Tossed up on the stumps and played back to the bowler.
Warner gets the score going again, worked off the pads through wide mid-on. Gambhir is the man on the boundary and they take a two. He hits the stumps, but DJ is well in.
short to Warner, he hacks again and PK puts in a tumble to field it in the covers.
full and straightening from the off stump line. Defended off the front foot.
over-pitched on the pads, Warner drills it straight to mid-on. That was a boundary ball.
another shoddy delivery, angling helpfully onto the pads and Warner clips it through midwicket for a couple.

Warner at his best, and he has a 50 at long last! Over-pitched once more by Umesh, who is looking out of depth in this format. Warner sets himself up strongly in the crease, waits to get under the ball and bangs it away through the covers for four.
on a length outside off stump, chopped without much timing to point.

Dhoni should make a note in his scratch pad. Gambhir has conceded two runs with his sloppiness on the third man boundary. Umesh delivers a short slower all wide of off stump at 115 kph. Warner cracks it away through point, and Gambhir doesn't bend low enough to stop it on the boundary. India are slackening alarmingly.
better ball. Good length at good pace on the stumps, and defended to the leg side.
tossed up on the pads, worked with the angle to the leg side for one.
Ashwin lets one through now, though DJ unintentionally may have made it tough for him. Full ball on the stumps, pushed past Ashwin for one.
there's a single for DJ every single ball if he wants it. Ashwin tossed up on the toes, DK tuns it to the leg side for one. Easy.
Warner punches to the leg side for one now.
short of a length, same line and angle. DJ gets yet another single with a nudge to leg.
tossed up on the off stump, Warner leans out and drives to cover. Dot ball after five singles.
tossed up from round the stumps, driven with the turn through cover.
back of a length on the pads, Warner turns it square for another single.
loopy ball that curves in from wide of the crease. DJ presses forward and drives through mid-off for one.
flatter and on the pads, easy single for Warner to the leg side.
good line and a hint of inward drift. DJ has no problem driving it through extra cover for one.
short ball at long last. Warner thumps it away wide of mid-off and Ashwin labours after it before pulling it in on the boundary. Bollywood actors run faster than that in slow-motion sequences.
listless bowling this. Ashwin drops another one short and Warner knifes it away into the covers for four more.
fuller, Warner leans out and pushes to long-off for a single.
tossed up outside off, and are my eyes playing tricks on me, or did DJ miss out on a single scoring option? Played back to the bowler.
DJ goes back in the crease and works a single to the leg side.
Sehwag makes up for some of Gauti's shoddiness. Dives away at square leg and stop s a Warner pull.
edged, but lands safe. Ashwin gets the ball to bounce on Warner who goes hard at a cut and gets a thick top edge. The ball loops up and lands just short of Tendulkar at short third man...
back of a length outside off, DJ pushes through the covers for a single.
full ball at 91.5 kph on the stumps. Warner defends to the off side.
on the pads, Warner turns it square and Raina intercepts.
flighted generously, Warner drives through wide mid-off for two. Ashwin's throw comes back as slowly as he runs in the outfield.
short of a length, Warner has no room to cut and finds point.

Australia lose one, India might have lost two. Full ball from Jadeja, Warner looked to sweep it with the turn, and got a top edge that took off into the Sydney sky. Raina runs back from square leg. Irfan runs in from deep fine leg. Like a silent movie, there was no calling between the two men, both transfixed on the orb in the sky. Irfan belatedly saw Raina hurtling towards him, and his eyes popped out in shock, but there was still no calling. Raina completes a superb catch and then they crash into each other. Raina inadvertedly punches Irfan in the chest, but he holds on to the ball tight. Both men are down. Irfan feels his chest gingerly as he goes off the field. A bit of a smile in there, which is good. Raina seems ok now. Great presence of mind to hold onto the ball through that collision. Raina does some stretches.
tossed up on the stumps, defended to the off side.
Warner is away, he leans out and defends to the off side. India's fielding continues to swing one way and another. A sloppy effort concedes the second.
Wade steers to the off side for another single.
pitched up on DJ's off stump, and he turns it to mid-on for one.
gets away with a disastrous ball. Short and a yard outside leg. DJ sweeps without leaving it, it would have been a wide. Goes straight to fine leg.
flighted generously outside off stump, Wade drills it to long-off for one.
Wade steals a single, leans out and defends to point for one.
there you go, on DJ's pads from round the stumps. Single worked to the leg side.
short of a length and wide of leg stump. Wade slaps it down to fine leg instead of encashing the wide.
too short, Wade thumps it straight to deep midwicket for a single.
fuller, gets DJ to lean out and defend.
again, good finish to the over. Flighted outside off and DJ drives straight to cover.
tossed up outside leg, turned with the angle to the leg side for one.
another misfield, this time from Raina at mid-on. Bad bounce? Single for DJ.
tossed up outside off, Wade leans out to meet it and steers towards point.
deceives him in the flight, Wade plays from the crease when he should have been forward. Defends it anyway.
fuller, Wade leans out and defends to the off side.

Is history being made here? Dhoni has appealed for DJ's wicket for the batsman obstructing the field. What's with India captains and run outs! DJ could be in trouble here. Full ball on off stump, Wade drives to Raina at short cover for a quick single. The throw was heading towards Dhoni, DJ was unintentionally in the way as he ran a straight line from his crease. He puts his right hand out to stop the ball from hitting him. Mind you, the ball wasn't travelling at pace, it wouldn't have wounded DJ if it had hit him. Can you be given out for doing that? According to the new ICC rules, yes. Dhoni has asked for it.. This will be harsh on DJ, but by the rules this could be out. Bowden and Taufel are taking their time over this with the third umpire having a close look. The third umpire has decided that DJ didn't put his hand out to save his wicket, but to save himself from damage. Dhoni is explaining to the umpires that he thinks otherwise. The spirit of cricket discussions can begin afresh! The rule is a fairly strange one, and the ICC has clearly not thought it through. The over-rates continue to take a beating!
full ball on the pads, Wade defends to the leg side.
poor ball, angling down the leg side, and Wade laps it to fine leg for a couple.
tossed up wide of off stump, Wade skips out and drives through mid-off.
DJ works a ball to the leg side and takes a single ... Throw comes in to the bowler's end, the crowd loves it!
Wade is beaten outside off by a ball that skids through from a length.
worked off the pads to the leg side for one more.
tossed up outside off, Wade mistimes the cut.
fuller ball, gets him forward and defends to the off side.
Wade gets a single now, through wide mid-on.
DJ nurdles with the spin through mid-on for a single.
Wade skips out and drives through long-off for a single.
short of a length from Jadeja, Wade defends to the leg side.
not for the first time, Jadeja tosses it down the leg side and Wade lap sweeps to fine leg for two.
Wade skips out and opens the face to steer to point for one.
angled in from wide of the crease, defended off the front foot.
angled in, DJ gets half forward and defends.
another short ball, DJ pulls to deep square leg for one.
back of a length outside off, pushed to cover for one.
full ball on the leg stump line, defended back to the bowler.

good work from Umesh, but he throws to the wrong end. Wade was gone for all money as he ran back half the way for the second run, but Yadav had flung it to Dhoni's end. Dhoni's relay to the bowler's end missed. Ahem, Wade deliberately came in the way this time. Does anyone know the rules? I suspect I don't!
on DJ's pads, turned to the leg side for a single.
Wade leans out and defends to the off side.
shorter ball, Wade stays back and guides it to point for one.
tossed up to Wade, he drives through extra cover for one.
DJ goes back and forces a length ball into the covers for one.
easy pinch of a single for Wade, he leans out and tucks to midwicket which is as vacant as a desolate mansion on a highway.
DJ's turn to get the front foot across and work to midwicket.
short of a length on the pads, Wade nudges to the leg side for one more single.
DJ defends a full ball watchfully down the track.
tossed up outside off, Wade defends to the off side.
on Wade's pads, he nudges to the leg side for another easy single.
flighted to Wade who skips out and drives a single through mid-off.
back in the crease is DJ for a resourceful dink to the leg side for one.
Wade works one from middle stump towards backward square leg.
loud appeal for lbw, but he seems to have been saved by the height. Or an inside edge. Tossed up and holding its line as DJ presses forward.
another one curves in towards the pads, DJ defends off the front foot.
run out attempt, no controversy! Wade dives in as Raina flings from cover to Dhoni, ball and runner in different trajectories.
tossed up outside off, Wade drives though mid-off for one.
DJ defends off the front foot to cover.
short ball, Jadeja escapes as DJ hacks it straight to midwicket.
Wade wades into Sehwag. He runs down the pitch, gets to the flight of a full ball and slams it over midwicket. Boundary after a long time.
Wade stays in the crease and pushes with the spin through extra cover for one.
worked off the pads to square leg for yet another gifted single.
back of a length on the stumps, Wade defends from the crease to the off side.
Wade tries to work a length ball to the leg side, but can't get it away.
Wade jumps out and defends as Sehwag smartly pulls the length back. Good finish to the over.
short ball, Wade misses out as he mistimes the pull, straight to midwicket.
stays back to a length ball and opens the face to steer behind point.
DJ stays in the crease and chops a short ball hard through point.,
fuller and slower, draws DJ forward and he drives to long-off.
on the pads again, Wade nurdles another single to the leg side.
tossed up on off stump, driven with the turn through mid-off.
full on the stumps from round the wicket. Defended off the front foot.
straighter, DJ's flick goes straight to midwicket.
back of a length on the stumps, DJ nudges with the turn to the leg side and misses out on another single.
he's made up for the two dots with a murderous pull as Sehwag drops hopelessly short. DJ pranced back in the crease and pulled resourcefully through midwicket.
tossed up to end the over, driven to mid on and it is drinks.
boy, what a horrible ball. Drops it in his half, Hussey jumps back and thrashes him through square leg for another four.
better line, full on leg, worked straight to one of those two fielders.
too straight now, DJ calmly flicks it down towards fine leg. Tendulkar runs back and saves the fourth run.

but of course, short of a length wide of off stump. India have burnt the script and drowned the ashes. Wade stays back and opens the face to steer a four to third man., Easy as they come. MSD has a word with Jadeja.
that's going down in Jadeja's CV. "Bowled Dot ball in batting Powerplay in Sydney"
on the pads, Wade goes back and whips a single to square leg.
Ashwin's turn to bowl down the leg side now, and Wade gets some pad on it as it trickles down to fine leg for runs.
on the pads again, worked with the angle to square leg for one.
tossed up outside leg, DJ drives to long-on for a single.
on a length outside off, Wade opens the face and dabs behind point for one.
stops on Hussey from a length and he plays it back uppishly, but it lands well short of Ashwin.
good end to the over. Full ball on off stump, DJ looks to dab square but can't beat point.
short of a length outside off from round the stumps. Steered to point.
back of a length again, Wade looks for the dab behind point but finds the fielder. Single denied once more.
length ball on the pads, Wade tickles it through square leg and thet hustle back for a second before Jadeja can run in and cover it.
short ball now, Wade sets up nicely and pulls hard, but there's protection in the deep.

PK slips down the leg side and DJ glances down to fine leg. They want two, but Tendulkar has the strongest arm in this side. He fires in a howitzer throw, and Wade wisely abandons ideas of the second.
on the pads now, Wade whips and sprints for a single.
back of a length, Wade tries to force to the leg side but can't get it away.
Ashwin's turn now to bowl an ugly long-hop and Wade has shredded it with a visceral pull over midwicket for six. That's his 50, and he's been allowed to play really well here.
fuller length, pushed in front of square for one.
on the pads to DJ, who whips it into the midwicket for a single.
fuller on the pads, Wade leans out and works it to the leg side.
back of a length, Wade tries to nudge square but can't get the gap. Two dots to end another Ashwin over.
well done by PK on his follow through. Full length ball, pushed down the ground, and PK dives full length to his right to field it.
too full, too straight and DJ trumpets it away through midwicket. He manages to find Ashwin inside the circle at midwicket.
on the pads, works it easily through square leg for another single.
DJ jumps out, Praveen sees him and keeps it full and straight on leg stump. DJ has no room to work with, and pushes a quick single to mid-on.
yorker, effective even at 124.8 kph. Wade digs it out to the off side.
another full ball, driven to Ashwin in the covers, who takes a while releasing the ball to allow the single.
length ball at pace on the pads, Wade flicks behind square for a couple. Not the best line to bowl with fine leg inside the circle.

Yadav has a wicket! He can't believe his luck, he turns back and appeals after getting a healthy edge to the keeper. A bowler with pace makes a different straight away. Wade tries to open the face and steer a length ball behind square on the off side. Extra pace and bounce, forces the edge straight into Dhoni's mitts.
short of a length outside off, Christian stays on the crease and defends to the off side.
thick outside edge once again as Yadav hustles Christian with a fast ball outside off. It bounds down to third man.
Intentional dab to third man from DJ, who uses Yadav's pace to pick another single. His fifty is up, it looks like he's got a 50 every time he's come out to bat in this series.
ah, blown it. Too short, too wide and it is called. Christian tries to carve it over the off side, but misses.
ends this over with a good length ball on the pads, that Christian works square for a single.
good length, and a tight line. Christian defends.
fired in again, Christian looks to work to leg and gets some pad on it.
another dot ball, full ball outside off that is played down the track.
huge lbw shout turned down. Christian was across the stumps and looking to nudge to leg, the ball struck him in front of leg, but it was sliding down.
tossed up to Hussey, who pushes a single into the covers.
excellent finish from Jadeja, keeps Christian in the crease with a full ball that is blocked into the covers.
thrown up on the stumps, DJ works it through mid-on for a single.
full ball on leg stump, Christian drives now through long-on for one more.
DJ is kept to a single as he leans across and drives through the covers. Jadeja does well to cut off the second.
carrom ball lands outside leg and straightens, Christian ticles to the leg side.
flighted on the stumps, Christian drives to long-on for one. It goes through DJ at the non-striker's end, admittedly quite low. But Hussey jumps over to let it go. Doesn't use his hands. Just saying.

good finish from Ashwin too as Australia wind up for a bang. Back of a length on the stumps, whipped through midwicket for one. In three games against Australia in the CB series, Ashwin has 0 wickets.

Yadav is on a roll. He's brought India back into this game with a twin-strike. Bowling your fastest bowler seems to be a good idea after all. Short of a length, hustled by the pace, DJ goes for the pull but the ball is through him very quickly. Another edge, straight to Dhoni, even as DJ loses his grip on the bat.. Yadav smiles, this is the first bit of good news he's had in a long time.
short of a length outside off, dabbed behind point for a single.
short of a length on the stumps, Christian jabs it down the track.
another short ball, this time the batsman sees it and plays the pull shot early. He strong-arms the pull shot through midwicket for four. Good timing, it went in front of square.
tries the yorker this time, tails in to Christian who is late coming forward, but he keeps it out.
slower ball at 116 kph, Christian defends sedately.

Sehwag strikes. Dhoni has a stumping. Sehwag and Dhoni do a high-five. Superb keeping from the captain. The ball skidded along from a good length without spinning in. McKay was leaning out and it went past the outside edge. His backfoot stepped up for a fraction of a second, and Dhoni was waiting. The bails are off before you could have said "Rift".
full ball on the stumps, Lee looks to sweep and is hit on the pad.
slipping down the leg. Lee slaps it round the corner, and Gambhir puts in the slide on the fine leg boundary and a relay throw to keep them to two.
Lee looks to steer to the off side, but can't get the ball away.
another dot ball, as Lee nudges with the spin straight to square leg.
another superb over for India. Lee works a length ball straight to square leg.
full ball tailing in late, Christian digs it out down the ground and Yadav parries it away.
Australia are getting stuck now. Full length ball comes in towards the pads and Christian works it straight to Sehwag at midwicket.
slower ball at 113 kph, drops it fractionally short and Christian pulls. There's protection at deep midwicket, and it is one of the honorary members of the SCG.
back of a length outside off stump, Lee can't get any power on the square drive and it goes straight to point.
136 kph on a lifting short ball that gave Lee absolutely no room. He tried to upper cut from beside his face, and made no contact.
the slower ball goes down the leg side and is called a wide.
another big curve ball that comes in at pace. Lee can't get it away. Bright phase this for India.
tossed up full outside off stump, swept square for a single.
Lee leans out and works a full ball to mid-on.
Gambhir is the one man having a wonky day. Length ball on the pads, worked behind square leg and Gambhir over-runs it but it doesn't cost a second.
on the pads, tucked square for a single.
pitches this one up, and Lee pushes it back down the track.
Lee tries to sweep a full ball on the stumps, but it hits the pad. India appeal for the lbw, but it is not given. Pitched outside leg.

Yadav does extremely well to make that look like a chance. Christan blasts a length ball straight back down the track and Yadav gets his hands to it, but it doesn't stick. Thankfully, the fingers don't fall off.
short ball now, Christian bunts for a single.
slower ball to Lee, who laboriously drags it through wide mid-on for a single.
slow legspinner, stops and sleeps on Christian who hacks to the off side. Raina rumbles in to cut off the single.
yorker misses the mark by an inch or so, and at Yadav's pace that's all it takes. Christian flicks it expertly through midwicket and the ball disappears through to the ropes.
that nipped in at pace, Christian couldn't get the bat on it and it goes off the pad to the off side for a leg bye.
short ball, Christian pulls it hard but there's protection at deep midwicket, so he gets only one.
flat and fast outside off, Lee goes back and hacks straight to Irfan in the off side. The momentum is gone.

and now Lee is gone. Having fired a couple through, Sehwag slows this one in the air and holds it back to hoodwink Lee as he charges out of the crease. He ends up swinging his swipe across the line, and the ball goes straight to Kohli at deep square leg.
length ball on the pads, Dan C goes back and works a single behind square.
drift outside off stump, Doherty mistimes the cut to point.
another one curls in out of Sehwag's fingers. Doherty chops it listlessly to point. Boy, how fast the tables have turned since Yadav came back on!
full and straight at the toes as Dan Christian chips out of the crease. Only a single available as the ball dribbles to the off side.
full length ball squeezes past Doherty's outside edge as he tries to drive through the off side.
super tight lines. Doherty advances and moves to the leg side as he does, and PK follows him. Straight on the boot, squeezed to the leg side for a single.
India somehow seem to have fielders everywhere now. Horror ball from PK, full toss down the leg side, and Christian manages to swing it straight to Irfan on the boundary behind square.
full length to Doherty at 123 kph, he drills it into the ground and PK leaps to parry it to mid-off. Single taken.

PK's lack of pace means Dan Christian's well-executed ramp shot doesn't go for four. 120 kph on a full length delivery outside off. Christian shuffles across and laps it over short fine leg and gets a couple as fine leg comes around to field.
Full ball, tossed up outside off and Dohertly slogs laboriously to long-on for two.
tossed up outside off, and sparks fly 20 yards from the cover fence where Kohli pulls off a magical save. He ran across fast to his left and dived full length to save a sure four.
ah, the Sehwag magic is fading in the last over. Doherty goes down on a knee and heaves a length ball miles over the midwicket boundary.
over-pitches a slow and full ball well wide off off stump. Doherty carves it over the covers for one.

poor throw from Gambhir allows Christian to pinch a second. Length ball, he skipped out to slam it over the leg side, but mis-hit it through square leg. Gambhir ran in from the deep and his throw came through slowly, bounced twice and was a good two yards off the stumps. Christian was in by the time Dhoni could break the stumps.

another wicket for Sehwag. Australia have made only 47 in the last 10 overs, and that despite 13 runs coming in this over. Christian skipped out, got to the pitch and muscled this strongly down to long on, but he didn't have the elevation to clear the boundary. Well held in the deep, and there are smiles on the Indian faces as the trot off.

inn2.comm: you almost saw that coming. Short and wide of off stump, Sehwag goes after it, but it was so wide that even he couldn't reach it. Third man is square, and is licking his lips.
beaten outside off. Back of a length outside off, good carry and some away movement. Sehwag tries to jab it away, and misses.
this time he lets one go outside off. 139 kph, short and lifting nicely outside off stump. Sehwag weaves away.

beaten by a purler. Lee pitches this up on off stump and gets it to dance away from Sehwag as he fumbles to cover the line. Can't get closer to the outside edge, or the off stump, without making contact.
rub your eyes in disbelief. Sehwag has shouldered arms to a back of length ball outside off stump. Ian Chappell says this is rare footage.
here comes the carve over the off side, but Sehwag doesn't try to hit it out of the ground. It skims through to third man after a couple of bounces.
A short ball to Sachin first up, 141 kph and jumping away. Tendulkar stays out of harm's way.
short of a length outside Sehwag's off stump, he gets into a good position to steer to the off side.
superb bouncer from Hilfy, pitches it perfectly to trouble Sehwag as it goes close to his face. He was going back in the crease, but had to yank the head and bat away at the last moment.
thundered through the covers. Back of a length from Hilfenhaus, Sehwag had enough width to go back and thrash it on the up. He played it in the air, but found the gap in the covers.
slips down the leg side, Sehwag can't get the glance away and it is a wide.
short of a driving length. Sehwag goes back and punches to mid-off.
short of a length again, Sehwag stays back, feet stationary, and punches to the off side.

no sign of runs for Sehwag, though he has some wickets today. Superb take from Hilfenhaus on his follow through. Length ball outside off, Sehwag smacks it right back on the up and it is dying on Hilfenhaus as he bursts through his follow through. He swoops low to pluck it inches above the turf. India are rocked early, again.
short of a length outside off stump and seaming away. Tendulkar shoulders arms.
another leave outside off from Tendulkar, he sees the short of length ball and lets it go.
the ball somehow evades Wade. Good stuff from Lee, gets this to jump in off the seam as Tendulkar left, and then it started curling in sharply after passing the stumps. Wade didn't have a chance.
Sachin's away with an edged single through backward point as he looks to cover the line to a length ball outside off.
over-pitched on the pads, Gambhir misses the flick, but his pads deflect the ball to fine leg. Lee keeps appealing for an lbw, but that was sliding harmlessly down the leg side.
back of a length on the stumps, Gambhir takes a quick single to mid-on to open his account.
short of a length on the off stump, the sort of ball Gambhir has routinely poked to the slips off the edge. He defends assuredly this time.
good bumper, only 136 kph but the perfect length. Gambhir ducks in a hurry.
back of a length and angling across. Gambhir hops and defends with an open face to the off side, before playing an air shot with a straighter bat
fuller length outside off, Gambhir strokes it into the covers off the front foot.
presses forward and drives straight to mid-off now.
back of a length on the stumps, Gambhir defends staunchly down the track.
barring the one that went for four legbyes, Lee has bowled exclusively short. Sachin hops behind the line and defends to the off side.
zippy short ball at 140 kph, Sachin arches back and lets it go without a second thought.
direct hit would have had Gambhir gasping. Short of a length outside off, Sachin drops it to point and takes off. Hussey runs in and under-arms, but misses the stumps. Gambhir would have been gone.
short of a length outside off, Gambhir sees it through to the keeper.
Mike Hussey is on fire in the covers. He leaps and pounces to his left to parry a fluent cover drive from Gambhir.
length ball at 142 kph to end the over, Gambhir defends solidly down the track.

Sachin pulls out the upper cut, and gets it away fine. I doubt if the fine-ness was entirely intentional. Hilf got this one to cut in from back of a length, and Sachin was cramped for room as he forced it away. It hit the edge of the top half of the bat.
this one goes the other way, Sachin lets it go and it is a wide.
fuller length and nice shape away from the right hander. Tendulkar watches it go through.
another leave outside off, Sachin's looking determined to get them to bowl at him today.
blazing stroke through point. This was short and seaming away to give him the width. Sachin was hopping back even as he ripped at it with a cut shot of finesse and ferocity.
fuller and a touch wider of off stump, Tendulkar leaves it.
and the off drive now. Doesn't overhit the over-pitched ball, just leans across towards the line and meets it with a perfect push of the straight bat. Beats mid-off and picks up three.
back of a length, Sachin stays back and steers backward of point for a single.

aha, Lee has burst a bumper right through Gambhir here. He was hopping and ducking, with the hands in front of his face and the eyes looking down as the ball took off from short of a length. The ball kisses the gloves and goes just past Wade as he leaps high and gets his glove-tips to it. Bowden signals legbyes. Gambhir was telling the umpire he gloved it. Pretty sure he wouldn't have, if Wade had held it.
fuller length, Gambhir works it efficiently to mid-on.
a subtle drop in pace, Gambhir is early into the front foot drive, but controls it and keeps it down towards mid-off.

everyone gets away with something. Over-pitched on the pads, Gambhir works it straight to short fine leg, but nearly on the full. Forrest then hurls the stumps down needlessly at the bowler's end, but escapes without conceding overthrows.

this is going to get very nasty. Tendulkar is run out, but Lee was in his way as he ran through. Back of a length outside off stump, Gambhir drops it to point and Tendulkar responds for a single. Lee ran across the pitch towards the ball, and then stopped to observe as Warner ran in from point and under-armed it. Lee needn't have been there, but he was. And he wasn't there intentionally to block Tendulkar, but he did. Tendulkar threw his arms up in frustration the moment the ball hit the stumps, but that's out by the laws of the game. He was not even in the frame. Every innings, we have a bone of contention!
short of a length outside off stump, Gambhir steers it through backward point for a single.
Kohli is away with a princely tuck through midwicket as Hilfenhaus angles into his pads.
short of a length outside off, Kohli defends to the off side.
back of a length outside off stump, defended to the off side again.
pitched up and seaming into the pads, Kohli whips it straight to midwicket.
Kohli punches beautifully through the off side. Hilfenhaus pitched this up outside off, Kohli leaned out and stroked it without effort past mid-off for four.
back of a length outside Gambhir's off stump, he plays it finer than point this time for the single.
full ball, angling into the pads and Kohli flicks languidly through backward square leg for a couple.
lets a length ball go through outside off as it hits the seam and darts in close to the stumps ... No-ball, free hit to come.

Kohli's carted the freebie for four. Short ball angling into the batsman's body isn't a good idea when you are bowling a free hit. Kohli cashes in, pivoting on his back foot and rolling the wrists to send it packing through midwicket.
another one darts in off the seam, and Kohli lets it pass outside off stump.
Kohli leans across and drives to mid-off off the middle of the bat.
jaffa to end the over, beats Kohli with one that hits the seam outside off stump and swerves away. Kohli pushes forward and feels for it.
short of a length on the stumps, worked off the hips to the leg side.
bouncer over the leg stump line, Gambhir tries to swat it away and misses.
they are saving fours for a living, are the Husseys. David now at short cover, holds a bullet as Gambhir leans out and drives hard into the off side.
slips this one well down the leg side and it is called a wide.
Hilfenhaus gets the ball to seam in, Gambhir inner edges a drive onto the pads.
another dot ball as Gambhir opens the face and steers a full ball straight to point.
Gambhir produces some top-class timing with the cut shot. Back of a length outside off, not that wide, but it was enough for Gambhir to latch onto with a cut behind point.
ah, Hilfy has lost the plot a touch. Full toss wide of off stump now, and Gambhir was almost apologetic to lean across and flash it through the point area. Two fours and two wides ruin the over.
short of a length outside off from McKay, Kohli blocks to point.
fuller length, again that proud forward press from Kohli who punches hard to mid-off.
clipped uppishly, but Kohli had that gap at midwicket in his sights as the full ball tails into him. McKay goes down on his follow through, some footing problems for the Aussie seames.
on Gambhir's pads, he works it neatly straight to midwicket.
full ball on off stump, Gambhir defends off the front foot to mid-off
Gambhir plays across the line to a full ball, and inside edges onto the pad. It carries a fair way to the leg side too, but drops short of the fielder.
tossed up from round the stumps, worked with the angle to midwicket.
this time Kohli uses the wrists to turn it behind square for a single.
back of a length on the stumps, Gambhir nudges it to the leg side.
short ball on the stumps, Kohli turns it with the spin for one more.
fuller, straightens from off stump line. Gambhir doesn't get too far forward but defends.
short ball on the pads, turned to square leg for one more.
pitched up outside off, Gambhir leans out and guides it into the covers for a single.
back of a length on the pads, worked through square leg for one.
angled across at 132 kph, Gambhir shoulders arms.
short of a length on the stumps. Gambhir tucks it to the leg side.
pitched further up, Gambhir digs it out straight to mid off.

edged but safe. Gambhir drawn out by a full length ball that was angling across. He gets the outside edge and it flies to the left of slip. It was dying on him too. Watson was the man at lone slip, and he was making a good effort.
tossed up on the stumps, Kohli flicks through square leg for a single.
Gambhir goes back in the crease and whips square for one more single.
short of a length and fired through, Kohli punches to the leg side and Hussey himself fields.
flighted on the stumps, Kohli works it easily behind square for a single.
slanted down the leg side, Gambhir works it straight to backward square leg.
straightens down the line from outside off stump. Gambhir opens the face and steers to point.
full length ball outside Kohli's off stump, he drives it easily through point for one.
whips this across wide of off stump, and Gambhir leaves. Close to a wide.
DJ does it again in the covers. Gambhir leans out and drives a full ball, David comes in the way with a dive.
on the pads, Gambhir turns it around to the leg side for a single.
length ball on the pads, worked with the angle towards square leg.
back of a length outside off stump, Gambhir opens the face and steers to point.
short of a length on off stump, Kohli defends off the front foot.
Kohli remains solid as he defends off the front foot to mid-on.
short this time outside off, Kohli quietly dabs it behind point.
full ball zips through Gambhir who misses an expansive drive through the covers.
pitched up again, well outside off and Gambhir gets the outside edge through backward point.

Watson strikes in his first over. Full length ball, comes through much slower than it did when Lee was going whang. Kohli was lazy leaning across for the flick, he seemed to play it early and didn't keep it down. Straight to midwicket, and Watson is thrilled. Injury or not, his golden arm remains intact.
Gambhir edges his first ball as Christian angles one across him. Edgy, but hanging in there.
back of a length on the hips, nudged on the hope towards square leg for one.
angled across Gambhir once again, and he lets it go to the keeper.

several run out chances there, but all safe. Gambhir drilled a full ball back, McKay got a finger on it and it hit the stumps, but Raina was in. Gambhir then wanted the single, and Raina responded eventually and bounded in, in time.
short ball outside off, Raina plays a rather daring steer off the back foot towards third man.

the timbre of timber clattering. Gambhir has played on. McKay angles another one across Gambhir innocuously, who hasn't looked himself in that area today. He went for a loose drive this time, feet well away from the bat, and got an inside edge onto the stumps.
Raina gives a better exhibition of the cover drive. Pitched up on off stump, Raina's forward press got him into position and the ball was under his eye when he smoked it into the covers.
back of a length outside off, Raina chops it behind point for a single.
back of a length from Watto and nipping in, it catches Dhoni on the thigh as he looks to defend.
plays all over a length ball as it nips in once more.
stays back and jabs from outside off towards the covers.
maiden from Watto, keeps Dhoni pinned with a length ball outside off that is defended to cover.
back of a length on the hips, Raina plays that ginger, jumping, nudging poke behind square leg for one.
short ball outside off, Dhoni hops back and blocks to the off side.
another bumper outside off stump, Dhoni watches it closely as it goes to keeper.
Dhoni didn't know which way to go there. 138 kph on a full ball outside off that then seamed away. Dhoni should have gone back and across, but he did neither and was beaten.
short ball, Dhoni stays back and punches well but straight to cover.
again on the back foot, but this time Dhoni potters across to cover the line and defends to the off side.
full ball outside off, Raina leans out and defends to the off side.

Raina has edged his way to a lot of criticsm. India are floundering. Length ball angled across innocuously, Raina couldn't have helped Wade with easier catching practice if he wanted to. He leaned across, angled the blade and lazily wafted it into Wade's gloves, playing the shot far, far away from his body.
goes wide with his first ball to Jadeja, and he leaves it through to Wade.
back of a length outside off stump, Jadeja stays back and defends to the off side.
goes past the outside edge now as Jadeja feels without conviction to a length ball angling across him.
on a good length, Jadeja gets the front foot across and defends to the off side.
short ball to Dhoni again, he pulls this time to fine leg for his first run.
Jadeja is away with a nudge to the leg side as Lee attacks with pace.
on a good length, Dhoni covers the line and defends to the off side.
back of a length outside off stump, defended to the off side.
angled in towards the pads, Dhoni shuffles across and nudges to the leg side.
full length on off stump, Jadeja defends to the off side with an indifferent forward press.
Watson plugs away on a length outside off, Dhoni defends down the track.
full length, draws Dhoni forward and gets him to drive to mid-on.
over-pitched on off stump, Dhoni drives it straight to mid-off.
back of a length, angling in from off stump, and Dhoni tucks to the leg side. This chase has gone to sleep, temporarily at least.
wow, Dhoni tries to shake it awake by jumping out of the pitch and driving hard, but Christian does well to stop it at short cover.
short ball outside off, another maiden from Watson to Dhoni as he punches into the covers.
another edge. Jadeja plonks the bat out invitingly to a 125 kph length ball angled across him. The edge falls short of Watson at slip.
on a length, Dhoni defends from the crease.

Dhoni dropped in the slips. Watson is the culprit again, and the ball seems to be following him. This one hit the seam and straightened outside off as Dhoni went at it with hard hands. It was dying on Watson, but if he'd held, that would have been the game.
covers the line better this time and plays a length ball to cover.
back of a length outside off, Dhoni hacks to third man to move to 3 off 23 balls.
angled across Jadeja from over the stumps and he lets it go.
Christian is like a wall in the covers.. Nothing's going past him. Dhoni absolutely murders a length ball to short cover, and Christian puts out his left hand to stop it.
eight saved off two balls. Over-pitched outside off, Dhoni lashes the off drive, but Hilfenhaus moves quickly and slides to his right to stop it.
over-pitched this time on the pads, and Dhoni flicks to deep square leg. They could have had three, but Dhoni stops Jadeja as McKay's relay throw comes in. First runs off Watto after 18 balls.
again he drives into the covers and Christian intercepts.
action replay. Full pitched outside off, Dhoni drives fluently to Christian in the covers.
fuller length, this time Dhoni doesn't even bother trying to hit it hard. He knows the drill, and meekly defends to Christian at cover.
India have a boundary after what seemed like an eternity. Jadeja uncorks the wrists on an elegant square drive as McKay angles it across him.
on the hips this time, Jadeja whips it behind square for a single.
back of a length, the ball jumps at Dhoni from outside off and he is hit on the thigh pad as he hops and looks ti nudge.
short ball outside off, Dhoni stays back and hacks it hard through backward point for one.
angled across Jadeja from over the stumps and he sees it through to the keeper.
bit of an lbw appeal as McKay gets a ball to straighten from the line of off stump. Jadeja was playing the half-cock forward defensive and it hit bat and pad, seemingly
short of a length outside off, Dhoni goes back and punches through the covers for a single.
fuller length to Jadeja, who defends.
short and wide of off stump, Jadeja goes back as it spins in and curs through backward point.
Dhoni lunges out and the ball hits high on the bat as he pushes forward..
slipping down the leg side, Dhoni works to the leg side.
tossed up pleasingly, and Dhoni defends carefully off the front foot.
over-pitched outside off stump, Jadeja drives off the front foot straight to mid-off.
wider of off stump, Jadeja watches it go through to the keeper.

Watson has held one in the slips at long last. Jadeja's turn to give cordon catching practice. Short ball angling across the left hander, who stays rooted on the crease and tries to steer it with hard hands through backward point. It takes the edge and flies into Watto's grasp at a good catching height.
back of a length on the stumps, Ashwin defends from the crease.
short and wide, close to being called too. Ashwin tries to slash it away, and misses. In fact, it is called.
short of a length, Ashwin defends to the off side.
full ball on off stump, Ashwin drives nicely but straight to mid-off.
short ball to Dhoni, who hangs back and whips through point for one.
loopy ball outside off, Ashwin drives through mid-off for one.
short ball, Dhoni goes back and pushes through the off side for one.
over-pitched wide of off stump, Ashwin square drives well but finds point.
inward drift from outside off, Ashwin goes back and defends.
Ashwin charges out, gets close to the flight and swipes Doherty through midwicket for a single.
short ball outside Ashwin's off stump, he attempts the cut and misses.
pitched up wide of off stump, Ashwin gets the edge as he presses forward and feels for it. The ball goes to third man for a single.
Dhoni punches a single to deep cover from the crease. He now has 10 off 38 balls.

top timing from Ashwin, but some sluggish running. Angled into the pads, Ashwin whips it sumptuously to square leg. Hilfenhaus slid and cleaned up in the deep, and India didn't show enough intent for the third.
good bouncer, Ashwin is hustled into the pull but the ball is through him.
short ball, Ashwin jabs at it down the track from the crease.
tossed up outside off, Dhoni pushes it into the covers.
flighted on off stump, Dhoni plays it right back to Doherty.
goes back to a short ball and punches it hard to deep cover for a single.
flighted outside off, Ashwin skips out and drives to cover.
goes back in the crease and forces a flat ball to mid-on.
Ashwin skips out and whips a full toss through midwicket for a single.
full length ball outside off, Ashwin pushes it into the covers.
back of a length outside off, Ashwin opens the face and steers to third man for one.
back of a length, Dhoni punches to cover once again. 11 off 42
Hilf plugs away on a length, and Dhoni again defends to the off side.
the pressure shows on Dhoni, who tries to carve a straight length ball over the covers. He gets a thick edge that flies behind point, and they get two.
back of a length, Dhoni covers the line and blocks again.
back of a length from Doherty, Ashwin pushes to cover.
Ashwin skips out and drives with the turn through the covers.
Dhoni pokes defensively from the crease to the off side of the pitch.
still no single, Dhoni steers to point and the fielder is sharp.
curling into the pads, Dhoni works it square for a single.
tossed up slow and generous outside off, Ashwin dabs to the off side for one.
back of a length from Hilf, Ashwin defends from the crease.

steered intentionally, but it went uncomfortably close to the fly slip. Short and wide of off stump, Ashwin delicately opened the face to glide it fine, and Watson went flying to his right at slip, but this was out of his range.
short of a length on the stumps, Ashwin works it to the leg side.
Ashwin runs in squarer this time, that's more like the area he was looking for. Single to third man.

Dhoni's gone, this time Mr. Cool's tactics haven't worked. He hasn't lasted long enough to make up for a slow start, and boy was the start slow.. Hilfenhaus slipped a quick length ball straight past Dhoni, who was trapped on the crease as he looked to work to leg. He misses the shot and it struck plumb in front.
bouncer from Hilf, Irfan ducks under it and it is called a wide.
length ball on off stump, Irfan defends down the track.
tossed up to Ashwin, defended off the front foot.
loopy again, driven off the front foot down the track.
back of a length outside off, Irfan hangs back and steers towards backward point.
tossed up on the stumps, Irfan works it round the corner.
short ball, spinning down the leg side, Irfan pulls straight to short fine leg.
tossed up wide of off stump, Irfan opens the face to glide it behind point.
full ball outside off stump, Irfan drives straight to cover. India are going nowhere here.
back of a length on the stumps, Irfan defends to the leg side.
Irfan plants the front foot across the line and swings, but can't time it. Good thing he got some bat on it.
short of a length, Irfan stays back and defends.
aha, Hilfy has taken one return catch blinder today, he nearly pulled off another one. Irfan thumped a full ball right back, and it was low again. This time Hilf couldn't grab as he went down.
over-steps as he delivers a full ball wide of off stump. Play and a miss, but the upcoming free-hit could help.

Irfan can ask for 12 runs for that shot. He's banged that free-hit into oblivion. Short length ball in the slot, Irfan rocks back and swings it clean and wild over deep midwicket. Into the second tier.
full ball outside off, steered off the front foot to point.
Ashwin backs away and drives with the turn over the covers. Good shot that, he gets two to deep extra cover.
Ashwin skips out again, Doherty sees him and yorks him. Ashwin manages to dig it out.
over-pitchjed on the toes, Ashwin on-drives with the wrists to midwicket for one.
full toss, Irfan was sizing up another big hit, but checked it in the end and slapped to square leg. Straight to the fielder.
tosses this up miles wide of off stump, no way he could swipe that to the leg side. Irfan hangs back and chops square for a single.
full and tailing into the pads, Irfan turns it straight to short fine leg and they get only a single.
full length ball wide of off stump with third man back. Ashwin dabs with an angled face to third man for one.
slower ball at 108 kph, Irfan works it around to wide mid-on for one.
Ashwin takes on the bouncer. It is 135 kph and he is a touch late on the shot, but gets away with a top edge that clears the infield. Three runs taken as wide mid-on runs back to field.
angled into Irfan's pads, he works it square for a single.
low full toss on the pads as Ashwin backs away, and he can't get it away.

Doherty is using the full toss as a wicket-taking option? He nearly gets one here, as Irfan skips out. The high full toss catches him unawares, but he still lofts it straight. Forrest at long-on moves to his right and lunges forward, but can't get there.
back of a length, Irfan hangs back and chops to the off side for one.
angled into the pads, no room to work with. Ashwin defends to the leg side.
some release in this Powerplay. Ashwin charges out and carts another full toss comfortably over the covers. It was four once he cleared the infield.
Ashwin advances again, Doherty goes full and wide of off stump, and Ashwin squeezes it straight to point.
leading edge! Makes a belated entry to this game. Ashwin tries to tickle a ball sliding well down the leg side and gets a leading edge that loops up and drops into mid-on's hands.

Irfan is summoning his inner Ganguly now. He's smoked Lee over long-on for a monster six. Good juicy length ball, Irfan leaned out and banged it through the line with a straight bat. That was thumped, Praveen was taking cover the moment Irfan made contact.
Lee responds with a near-perfect yorker just outside off stump. Irfan can't get it away.
slower ball, drops short and slips wide of off stump.

Irfan is gone, India are going down and Australia are likely to get a bonus point too. Lee sends down a full toss, Irfan tries to heave over the leg side and gets a top edge that takes off. When it comes down, there's a Hussey under it. Not much chance of anyone from that family dropping catches.
PK backs away and swings wildly at a short ball and it goes off the edge to third man.
no-ball for height as Lee loses control of the yorker and bowls it straight at Yadav's hip.
Yadav has a monster swing at a length ball outside off. He made room and did a whirlpool on his toes, and it is a miracle that he's still on his feet. What a mild stroke.
he does a Walsh now, and nonchalantly lets one go outside off.
full ball to PK, defended back to the bowler.
tossed up outside off and spinning away, PK thinks of it and then lets it go.

all over at the SCG. Short ball outside off, PK has a big swipe at it and inside-edges onto the stumps. Australia have had lots of upheaval and three different captains during the tournament, but they are into the final.
